Generate self-signed certificates automatically

For instance, you can generate self-signed certificates automatically to simulate HTTPS with localhost.

1. Edit configuration file
    $> genserve edit server rserver


Set the property allowSelfSigned to "yes"
    {
  "rserver": {
    "ssl": "yes",
    "allowSelfSigned": "yes",
      ...
  }
}


When you start "rserver", the system will automatically generate the certificates and update the configuration files.
